N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 635-6.7 - Costs applicable to goods, services or property not covered elsewhere in this Subpart

State Regulations
(a) Costs
applicable to goods, services or property not covered elsewhere in this Subpart
and furnished to the provider or individual by a related party shall be
allowable at the lesser of: (1)
the cost to
the related party; or
(2)
the price
of comparable goods, services or properties that could be obtained
elsewhere. (b) Interest
on working capital indebtedness in accordance with section
635-6.4
(f) of
this Subpart are allowable. In the event that a loan is not in accordance with
the standards listed in section
635-6.4
(f) of
this Subpart, the need for such loan shall be demonstrated in writing to the
commissioner, and the express written approval of the commissioner is
required. Notes
